page.title: 19 TRANSPORT
page.content: Mr&Mrs Dawson from Stuartfield take the children to school. Joan sets off from home at 8.10am and goes by Old Deer on to the New Pitsligo _ Mintlaw road,then back into Maud to leave the first run at school. Then out on the Maud _ Old Deer road and turns up by Bulwark to collect me at 8.40am,then on over the back up Annieswells and on into Maud.She then sets off again for the last run, the little ones that do not go into school till 9.30am. There is also a local service bus run by Alexanders.Buses pass through the village going to Peterhead, Aberdeen and Turiff.But the service has been greatly cut as most people have cars now and do not rely on buses so much.Buses also collect senior pupils that attend Mintlaw Academy.
